project_descr: Business Call to Action aims to accelerate progress towards the SDGs by challenging companies to develop inclusive business models that engage people at the base of the economic pyramid within their value chain.

outputs.output_descr: The goal of the BCtA is to accelerate progress towards the MDGs by encouraging companies to adapt their business models to improve the lives of people while leveraging their core business expertise and realizing commercial success.
donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: UNDP Partnership Report on Business Contributions to the MDGs
